root.name: 4x4 Off-Road Racing
root.description: When first starting the game, you have the option of choosing four different tracks with their own unique terrain.* Baja, which is rough desert* Death Valley, which is a desert* Georgia, which is mud and hills* Michigan, which is snowAfter choosing a track, you get to choose which off-road vehicle is best suited to your chosen track, and finally, you can customise your vehicle based on the amount of money you have.
